item.title: A Game of Chance
item.description: """Simulating the dice game Craps""" ## 'Simulating the dice game Craps' import random def roll_dice(): """Roll two dice and return their face values as a tuple.""" die1 = random.randrange(1,7) die2 = random.randrange(1,7) return (die1, die2) def display_dice(dice): """Display one roll of the two dice.""" die1, die2 = dice print(f'Player rolled {die1} + {die2} = {sum(dice)}') die_values = roll_dice() #first roll display_dice(die_values) # determine game status and point, based on first roll.
